meta.content: Iberville Charter Academy is a tuition-free public charter school, located in Iberville Parish, Louisiana, educating students in grades K-8. Iberville Charter Academy offers a safe free education with leading technology. Apply online today for Iberville Charter Academy located in Iberville Parish.

Free Public Charter School | Iberville Charter Academy | Apply Now | Plaquemine School | Louisiana Charter

div.p:
Iberville Charter Academy is a tuition-free public charter school educating students in grades
K-8. Iberville Charter Academy is governed by the South Louisiana Charter Foundation, Inc.
and a member of the Charter Schools USA (CSUSA) family of schools.
